column4: With Ubuntu 11.04 plymoth is weird, when I power up my computer I have an purple screen without ubuntu logo with somthing appears to be artefacts but at the shutdown I have a clean plymouth with ubuntu logo
do you use proprietary video drivers?
strange. Not sure personnally then, maybe others can contribute
there is a guide to force the boot to use the fb driver during boot. The nouveau driver will load when x starts
